H0.text: Ford recently announced that they were shutting down production of another of their marques. Active for the last 81 years, what brand is being discontinued. Plymouth

H3.text: Ford recently announced that they were shutting down production of another of their marques. Active for the last 81 years, what brand is being discontinued. Mercury

A4.text: On June 2, 2010, Ford announced the closure of the Mercury line effective at the end of 2010

A5.text: In 2009, Ford began to make the final revisions to the Mercury model line, phasing out nameplates at the end of their model cycles
